column2: newf_garph<-ggplot(newf_situ_md3,aes(x=date,y=logval))+geom_line(aes(colour=variable))+scale_color_discrete(breaks=c("newf_jointcap","newf_coop","newf_forecap","newf_sate","newf_private"),labels=c("合资企业","合作企业","外资企业","国有企业","民营企业"))
newf_garph+labs(x="日期（月）",y="新增企业数（取对数）",colour="企业类型",title="图三：2016-2018年不同类型企业市场进入情况")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))+ theme_ft_rc()
